content:
DataGridBoundColumn Class

In this Article

Serves as the base class for columns that can bind to a property in the data source of a DataGrid.

Syntax

Declaration

public abstract class DataGridBoundColumn : System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • DispatcherObject
  • DependencyObject
  • System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn
  • DataGridBoundColumn

Constructors summary

DataGridBoundColumn()

Initializes a new instance of the DataGridBoundColumn class.

Fields summary

EditingElementStyleProperty

Identifies the stem.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.EditingElementStyle* dependency property.
ElementStyleProperty

Identifies the stem.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.ElementStyle* dependency property.

Properties summary

Binding

Gets or sets the binding that associates the column with a property in the data source.
ClipboardContentBinding

Gets or sets the binding object to use when getting or setting cell content for the clipboard.
EditingElementStyle

Gets or sets the style that is used when rendering the element that the column displays for a cell in editing mode.
ElementStyle

Gets or sets the style that is used when rendering the element that the column displays for a cell that is not in editing mode.

Methods summary

OnBindingChanged(BindingBase,BindingBase)

Notifies the DataGrid when the value of the stem.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding* property changes.
OnCoerceIsReadOnly(Boolean)

Determines the value of the stem.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.IsReadOnly* property based on property rules from the data grid that contains this column.
RefreshCellContent(FrameworkElement,String)

Rebuilds the contents of a cell in the column in response to a binding change.

Constructors

  • DataGridBoundColumn()

    Initializes a new instance of the DataGridBoundColumn class.

    protected DataGridBoundColumn ();

Fields

  • EditingElementStyleProperty

    Identifies the stem.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.EditingElementStyle* dependency property.

    public static readonly System.Windows.DependencyProperty EditingElementStyleProperty;
  • ElementStyleProperty

    Identifies the stem.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.ElementStyle* dependency property.

    public static readonly System.Windows.DependencyProperty ElementStyleProperty;

Properties

  • Binding

    Gets or sets the binding that associates the column with a property in the data source.

    public virtual System.Windows.Data.BindingBase Binding { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • BindingBase

      The object that represents the data binding for the column. The default is null.

    Remarks

    The Binding property allows a column to specify a property of the data grid's ItemsSource to bind to. For more information about binding paths, see the "Binding Path Syntax" section in Binding Declarations Overview.

  • ClipboardContentBinding

    Gets or sets the binding object to use when getting or setting cell content for the clipboard.

    public override System.Windows.Data.BindingBase ClipboardContentBinding { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • BindingBase

      An object that represents the binding.

  • EditingElementStyle

    Gets or sets the style that is used when rendering the element that the column displays for a cell in editing mode.

    public System.Windows.Style EditingElementStyle { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Style

      The style that is used when rendering an editing element. The registered default is null. For information about what can influence the value, see DependencyProperty.

  • ElementStyle

    Gets or sets the style that is used when rendering the element that the column displays for a cell that is not in editing mode.

    public System.Windows.Style ElementStyle { get; set; }

    Property Value

    • Style

      The style that is used when rendering a display-only element. The registered default is null. For information about what can influence the value, see DependencyProperty.

Methods

  • OnBindingChanged(BindingBase,BindingBase)

    Notifies the DataGrid when the value of the stem.Windows.Controls.DataGridBoundColumn.Binding* property changes.

    protected virtual void OnBindingChanged (System.Windows.Data.BindingBase oldBinding, System.Windows.Data.BindingBase newBinding);

    Parameters

    • oldBinding
      BindingBase

      The previous binding.

    • newBinding
      BindingBase

      The binding that the column has been changed to.

  • OnCoerceIsReadOnly(Boolean)

    Determines the value of the stem.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.IsReadOnly* property based on property rules from the data grid that contains this column.

    protected override bool OnCoerceIsReadOnly (bool baseValue);

    Parameters

    • baseValue
      Boolean

      The value that was passed to the delegate.

    Returns

    • Boolean

      true if cells in the column cannot be edited based on rules from the data grid; otherwise, false.

  • RefreshCellContent(FrameworkElement,String)

    Rebuilds the contents of a cell in the column in response to a binding change.

    protected override void RefreshCellContent (System.Windows.FrameworkElement element, string propertyName);

    Parameters

    • element
      FrameworkElement

      The cell to update.

    • propertyName
      String

      The name of the column property that has changed.
